text: kya tumhare paas tum se pehle ke logo ki qabar nahi aayi? yani khaume nuh ki aur aadh wa samoodh ki aur un ke baadh walo ki jinhe sivaaye Allah taâ€™ala ke aur koi nahi jaanta, un ke paas un ke rasool maujize laaye lekin unhone apne haath apne mu mein daba liye aur saaf keh diya ke jo kuch tumhe de kar bheja gaya hai, hum us ke munkir hai aur jis cheez ki taraf tum hamein bula rahe ho, hamein to us mein bada bhaari shuba hai
